nodes.text: Oh, you're the locksmith? Thank you for coming so quickly!

choices.text: It's my job. Let's get started. (Professional)

nodes.text: You seem like a nice person! I was really worried about this lock.

choices.text: Don't worry, I'll have it open in no time!

nodes.text: Of course. The lock is right here. I really appreciate your help.

choices.text: Let me take a look at it.

nodes.text: Oh... um, thank you. *blushes* Should we focus on the lock?

choices.text: You're right, sorry. Let me get to work. (Apologize)
Of course, but I meant it. (Double down)

nodes.text: *giggles nervously* You're quite forward... Let's see if you're as good with locks as you are with words.

choices.text: I'm good with my hands in general. (Confident)

nodes.text: Alright, I'll let you work. Just call me if you need anything!
